attributes.action: Beal Valley Golf Course Development is a waste of money
attributes.additional_details:
Beal Valley Golf Course development as been going on for the past 15yrs, getting stopped by goverments coming in and out of power etc. It is just a waste of time and money
This is a massive piece of land that should be used for better thing such as  an entertainment complex. Bowling, ice skating, cinema, football pitches, tennis and other sports, gym or something, a shopping mall as well maybe.

Now lets all let our voices be heard by signing this petition this topic will be brought up in parliment if we can hit over 100,000 signitures.
